title: Chivas 1-2-3
alternative_title: Sorcerer on the Rocks, シーバス１-２-３
description: Ruthless sorcerer Chivas Scotch is hired by a count named Cuttlefish to destroy an evil monster attacking a nearby village. But things go awry when Chivas fails to destroy the monster and he's forced to transfer his spirit in the body of his beautiful servant Gin Fizz.
